price: El Faraón dijo: "Convoquen ante mí a todo hechicero experto".
arabic: وَقَالَ فِرۡعَوۡنُ ٱئۡتُونِي بِكُلِّ سَٰحِرٍ عَلِيمٖ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: waqāla fir'ʿawnu i'tūnī bikulli sāḥirin ʿalīmin
